cities.name: Ayia Napa

interests.name: Nissi Beach
interests.description: Famous sandy beach with shallow turquoise water and a small islet reachable by foot in calm conditions.

interests.name: Ayia Napa Monastery
interests.description: Historic medieval monastery located in the town center, offering a quiet contrast to the beach scene.

interests.name: Cape Greco National Forest Park
interests.description: Protected natural area with sea cliffs, hiking trails, caves, and panoramic viewpoints.

interests.name: Fig Tree Bay
interests.description: Popular nearby beach in Protaras known for calm waters and soft sand.

interests.name: Ayia Napa Harbour
interests.description: Small harbor area with walking paths, caf√©s, and boat excursions.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Cypriot dishes such as souvlaki, halloumi cheese, meze, fresh seafood, and loukoumades. Taverns near the harbor are good for traditional meals.

full_day.Morning: Start your day at Nissi Beach ‚òÄÔ∏è for swimming and relaxing by the sea.
full_day.Afternoon: Have lunch near the harbor üçΩÔ∏è and visit the Ayia Napa Monastery üèõÔ∏è for a short cultural break.
full_day.Sunset: Head to Cape Greco üåÖ to enjoy cliffs, sea views, and sunset colors.
full_day.Night: Evening walk around Ayia Napa Harbour ‚ú® with dinner by the water.

spring.description: Warm but comfortable weather with blooming nature around Cape Greco.

summer.description: Hot weather, lively atmosphere, and full beach life.

autumn.description: Warm sea, fewer crowds, and relaxed pace.

winter.description: Mild winters with calm streets and nature-focused visits.

public_transport_tips.tip: Local buses connect Ayia Napa with Protaras and Cape Greco.
Walking is practical within the town center and beach areas.
Larnaca Airport is the main international gateway, about 45 minutes away.

city_events.name: Ayia Napa International Festival
city_events.description: Cultural festival featuring music, dance, and Cypriot traditions.

places.name: Thalassa Municipal Museum
places.description: Museum dedicated to the maritime history of Cyprus.

places.name: Makronissos Tombs
places.description: Ancient Hellenistic and Roman tombs near the coast.

hidden_gems.name: Early-morning Nissi Beach
hidden_gems.description: Calm water and quiet atmosphere before crowds arrive.

hidden_gems.name: Sea caves of Cape Greco
hidden_gems.description: Dramatic coastal formations away from main beaches.

cities.name: Larnaca

interests.name: Finikoudes Promenade
interests.description: Palm-lined seaside promenade with caf√©s, restaurants, and direct access to the main city beach.

interests.name: Church of Saint Lazarus
interests.description: 9th-century Orthodox church built over the tomb of Saint Lazarus, one of Cyprus‚Äô most important religious landmarks.

interests.name: Larnaca Salt Lake
interests.description: Large salt lake famous for winter flamingos and scenic walking paths.

interests.name: Hala Sultan Tekke
interests.description: Important Islamic shrine located beside the Salt Lake, surrounded by palm trees and calm scenery.

interests.name: Mackenzie Beach
interests.description: Popular sandy beach close to the airport, known for beach bars and plane-spotting views.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Cypriot meze, grilled halloumi, souvlaki, fresh seafood, and traditional desserts like loukoumades. Finikoudes and Mackenzie areas have many reliable taverns.

full_day.Morning: Start with a seaside walk along Finikoudes Promenade ‚òÄÔ∏è and breakfast by the sea.
full_day.Afternoon: Visit the Church of Saint Lazarus ‚õ™, then head to Mackenzie Beach üèñÔ∏è for swimming and lunch.
full_day.Sunset: Walk around Larnaca Salt Lake üåÖ and stop by Hala Sultan Tekke.
full_day.Night: Dinner at Mackenzie or Finikoudes ‚ú® with relaxed seaside atmosphere.

spring.description: Warm temperatures and blooming nature around the Salt Lake.

summer.description: Beach life, open-air events, and lively evenings.

winter.description: Migratory flamingos gather at the Salt Lake.

public_transport_tips.tip: Local buses connect beaches, the city center, and the airport.
Larnaca is compact and walkable along the seafront.
Larnaca International Airport is located just south of the city.

city_events.name: Kataklysmos (Festival of the Flood)
city_events.description: Traditional Cypriot festival with music, food, and cultural events by the sea.

places.name: Pierides Archaeological Museum
places.description: Small museum showcasing Cypriot archaeology from prehistoric to medieval times.

places.name: Larnaca Marina
places.description: Pleasant marina area near Finikoudes with boats and caf√©s.

hidden_gems.name: Early-morning Finikoudes
hidden_gems.description: Peaceful promenade before the city wakes up.

hidden_gems.name: Quiet paths near Hala Sultan Tekke

cities.name: Limassol

interests.name: Limassol Marina
interests.description: Modern marina with yachts, seaside restaurants, caf√©s, and a lively promenade popular day and night.

interests.name: Limassol Old Town
interests.description: Historic center with narrow streets, traditional shops, local taverns, and cultural landmarks.

interests.name: Limassol Castle
interests.description: Medieval castle housing the Cyprus Medieval Museum, located in the heart of the Old Town.

interests.name: Molossia Promenade
interests.description: Long palm-lined coastal promenade ideal for walking, cycling, and sea views.

interests.name: Kourion Archaeological Site
interests.description: Ancient Greco-Roman city with a spectacular cliffside theatre overlooking the Mediterranean.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Cypriot meze, souvlaki, grilled halloumi, fresh seafood, and local wines from nearby Troodos foothills. Old Town taverns offer authentic flavors.

full_day.Morning: Start with coffee at Limassol Marina ‚òÄÔ∏è, then walk into the Old Town.
full_day.Afternoon: Visit Limassol Castle üèõÔ∏è and enjoy lunch nearby üçΩÔ∏è, followed by a stroll along the Molossia Promenade.
full_day.Sunset: Take a short trip to Kourion üåÖ for dramatic sunset views over the sea.
full_day.Night: Dinner at the marina ‚ú® or in the Old Town with relaxed nightlife and seaside ambiance.

spring.description: Comfortable temperatures and blooming landscapes make sightseeing ideal.

ideas.name: Kourion visit
ideas.description: Clear spring skies over ancient ruins.

summer.description: Hot weather, beach life, and open-air events across the city.

autumn.description: Warm sea temperatures and wine activities in nearby villages.

winter.description: Quiet city life with mild temperatures and cultural focus.

public_transport_tips.tip: Local buses connect Limassol Marina, Old Town, beaches, and suburbs.
Walking and cycling are ideal along the long seafront promenade.
Paphos and Larnaca airports are reachable by intercity buses.

city_events.name: Limassol Carnival
city_events.description: Major cultural event with parades, costumes, and celebrations.

places.name: Fasouri Watermania
places.description: Large water park popular with families and visitors during summer.

places.name: Cyprus Motor Museum
places.description: Museum featuring a wide collection of classic and vintage cars.

hidden_gems.name: Early-morning Molossia Promenade
hidden_gems.description: Quiet sea views before the city becomes active.

hidden_gems.name: Backstreets of the Old Town
hidden_gems.description: Authentic local life away from main streets.

cities.name: Nicosia

interests.name: Ledra Street Crossing
interests.description: Pedestrian street and official crossing point between the southern and northern parts of the city, symbolizing Nicosia‚Äôs divided history.

interests.name: Cyprus Museum
interests.description: The largest archaeological museum in Cyprus, showcasing artifacts from prehistoric to Roman times.

interests.name: Leventis Municipal Museum
interests.description: Museum dedicated to the history of Nicosia, located near the old town walls.

interests.name: Venetian Walls of Nicosia
interests.description: 16th-century circular fortifications surrounding the old city, built by the Venetians.

interests.name: Famagusta Gate
interests.description: One of the three original gates of the Venetian walls, now used as a cultural venue.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Cypriot meze, souvlaki, sheftalia, grilled halloumi, and traditional sweets. Old town taverns around Ledra and Onasagorou streets are popular with locals.

full_day.Morning: Start your day at the Cyprus Museum ‚òÄÔ∏è to understand the island‚Äôs ancient history.
full_day.Afternoon: Walk through the old city to Leventis Municipal Museum üèõÔ∏è and have lunch along Ledra Street üçΩÔ∏è.
full_day.Sunset: Stroll along sections of the Venetian Walls üåÖ near Famagusta Gate.
full_day.Night: Dinner in the old town ‚ú® and an evening walk around Onasagorou Street.

spring.description: Mild temperatures make walking the old city comfortable and pleasant.

ideas.name: Old town walks
ideas.description: Ideal weather for exploring historic streets.

summer.description: Hot days with lively evenings focused on caf√©s and cultural events.

autumn.description: Warm days, fewer visitors, and relaxed urban life.

ideas.name: Photography walks
ideas.description: Soft autumn light on stone walls.

winter.description: Cool but comfortable weather with calm streets and cultural focus.

public_transport_tips.tip: Local buses connect the old city with modern districts.
The old town within the Venetian walls is best explored on foot.
Intercity buses connect Nicosia with Limassol, Larnaca, and Paphos.

city_events.name: Nicosia International Festival
city_events.description: Cultural festival featuring music, theater, and exhibitions.

places.name: Shacolas Tower Observatory
places.description: Observation deck offering panoramic views over Nicosia.

cities.name: Paphos

interests.name: Paphos Archaeological Park
interests.description: UNESCO World Heritage site featuring Roman villas with well-preserved mosaics, ancient ruins, and an amphitheater.

interests.name: Paphos Harbour & Medieval Castle
interests.description: Historic harbor area with a medieval fortress, promenade, caf√©s, and sea views.

interests.name: Tombs of the Kings
interests.description: Impressive underground Hellenistic necropolis carved into rock, despite the name not actually royal tombs.

interests.name: Coral Bay
interests.description: Popular sandy beach north of Paphos with calm waters, ideal for swimming.

interests.name: Aphrodite‚Äôs Rock (Petra tou Romiou)
interests.description: Legendary sea stack believed to be the birthplace of Aphrodite, one of Cyprus‚Äô most iconic natural landmarks.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Cypriot meze, fresh seafood, souvlaki, grilled halloumi, and local desserts. Harbor-side taverns are great for sunset dining.

full_day.Morning: Start at the Paphos Archaeological Park ‚òÄÔ∏è to explore ancient mosaics and ruins.
full_day.Afternoon: Head to Paphos Harbour üèõÔ∏è for lunch, then visit the Tombs of the Kings.
full_day.Sunset: Drive or bus to Aphrodite‚Äôs Rock üåÖ for dramatic coastal sunset views.
full_day.Night: Dinner at the harbor ‚ú® followed by a relaxed seaside walk.

spring.description: Warm but comfortable weather ideal for archaeological exploration.

summer.description: Beach life, open-air events, and lively evenings.

autumn.description: Warm sea, fewer crowds, and soft light.

winter.description: Comfortable climate with calm streets and cultural focus.

public_transport_tips.tip: Local buses connect the harbor, archaeological sites, and Coral Bay.
Walking is practical around the harbor and old town areas.
Paphos International Airport is close to the city center.

city_events.name: Paphos Aphrodite Festival
city_events.description: Open-air opera festival held near the medieval castle.

places.name: Agia Solomoni Catacombs
places.description: Early Christian catacombs and chapel near the archaeological park.

places.name: Paphos Lighthouse
places.description: Coastal lighthouse offering open views over the sea.

hidden_gems.name: Early-morning harbor
hidden_gems.description: Quiet reflections and fishing boats at dawn.

hidden_gems.name: Coastal paths near Lighthouse
hidden_gems.description: Peaceful seaside walks away from crowds.
